hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Abbas:Once Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) passed by a dead sheep and said to the people, "Wouldn't you benefit by its skin?" The people replied that it was dead. The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "But its eating only is illegal

chapter.ara-name: باب جُلُودِ الْمَيْتَةِ قَبْلَ أَنْ تُدْبَغ
chapter.eng-name: The hides of dead animals before tanning
